item.title: Restore iPhone without upgrading OS
item.description: If you need to restore your iPhone you'll notice iTunes tells you that upon restoring it, the latest version will be installed. This will be just fine for regular iPhones of course, but for the people who have a Jailbroken iPhone, it's not ok (At least until the newest version is ready for jailbreak) Well don't panic since this is a really simple thing to do, first, download the iPhone firmware you want to restore into.
